title: DDFP 489: Week 2 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Color Rush Uniform Review
itunes:title: DDFP 489: Week 2 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Color Rush Uniform Review
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Matt "Money" Smith to discuss the Bengals-Steelers rivalry, the Week 2 games they are looking forward to the most and whether or not Josh Norman will bounce back against Dez Bryant. Also, Shek asks the guys to weigh in on the new color rush uniforms and he gives his "Uniform Monitor" stamp of approval to the winners. Then, the guys debate and make their selections for the biggest games in the Week 2 edition of "Red Challenge Flag Picks." 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
